content:
I keep saying that as we think about empowered patients generating health data for their own purposes, we must keep our minds (and our architecture) open to things we in the industry hadn't imagined.

Case in point:
I've often spoken about the Quantified Self movement, including at my 2018 Amsterdam DevDays talk. Its founder Gary Wolf (@Agaricus on Twitter) has just posted a really thought-provoking article on Medium about how he's cobbling together his own tracking and modeling of data for his Essential Tremor condition. Have a look. https://medium.com/article-27/10milliondiscoveries-1570a79f0334
